# Temple (Building)
## Overview
**Temple**

**Create** 28 Goods, 2 Influence, 29 Labor, 2 Magic (1,400 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Altar (Room)|Altar]], 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 1 [[Confessional (Room)|Confessional]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Sanctum (Room)|Sanctum]], 1 [[Statue (Room)|Statue]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]]

A large place of worship dedicated to a deity.
